sections.purpose: To provide orbital shaking for mixing culture flasks or bottles.
sections.scope: Applicable to culture mixing and extraction in Microbiology.
procedure: Place flasks or bottles evenly on the shaker platform.
Set the required speed and shaking duration.
Start the shaker and check for smooth operation.
At the end of the run, stop the shaker before removing containers.
Clean the platform after any spills.
precautions: Do not overload the platform or run at unstable speeds.
Keep the shaker away from bench edges.
Report any unusual noise or vibration.
Disconnect from power before cleaning internal parts.
